function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Resistance to compliance with mitigation measures","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus, higher mortality rates, and overburdening of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, education on the importance of compliance, and enforcement of regulations","Technologies":"Public health messaging, social media campaigns, and surveillance technology","People":"General public, especially those resistant to compliance","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in sustaining long-term compliance with mitigation measures","Impact":"Potential resurgence of the virus, prolonged pandemic, and fatigue from continuous adherence","Mitigation":"Support systems for mental health, community engagement, and economic assistance for affected individuals","Technologies":"Telehealth services, community engagement platforms, and financial support systems","People":"Long-term residents, essential workers, and individuals facing economic hardships","Owner":"Community organizations, mental health professionals, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of compliance with mitigation measures","Impact":"Determining the success of mitigation efforts, understanding behavioral drivers, and informing future policy decisions","Mitigation":"Data collection and analysis, behavioral research, and interdisciplinary collaboration","Technologies":"Data analytics, behavioral tracking systems, and collaboration platforms","People":"Research institutions, behavioral scientists, and policy makers","Owner":"Public health agencies, academic institutions, and government bodies"}]}
